text: How long will a query take? » CPU: Small cost; tough to estimate » Disk: # of block transfers » Memory: Amount of DRAM used » Network: # of messages How many tuples will be read/written? [t is too expensive to run every possible plan to determine this information, so the DBMS need a way to derive this information... .
